full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**

**Request for Proposal: Modernization of Elevating Devices at Charlottetown Research and Development Centre**

**Reference:** WS4645126576

**Publication Date:** June 21, 2024

**Tender Closing Date:** July 9, 2024, at 14:00 (ATLANTIC)

**Background:**
The Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada requires the modernization of elevating devices at the Charlottetown Research and Development Centre (CRDC) in Charlottetown, Prince Edward Island. The project involves the design services for the modernization of elevating devices.

**Overview of the Project:**
The selected contractor will be responsible for designing and modernizing the elevating devices at the CRDC. The project scope includes the upgrade of existing elevators, installation of new elevators, and the implementation of necessary safety features.

**Bid Submission:** Invited firms only may submit a proposal in response to this Request for Proposal (RFP). Only three firms have been invited: KJA Consultants Inc, Rooney Irving & Associates Ltd, and Solucore Inc.

**Evaluation Criteria:**
The proposal will be evaluated based on the lowest price methodology.

**Submission Requirements:**
Proposals must be submitted in either English or French. Once the tender closing date expires, no further submissions will be accepted.

**Debrief:**
Unsuccessful bidders may request a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation. Requests for debriefing must be submitted within 15 working days from receipt of notification that their bid was unsuccessful.

**Contracting Authority:**
For more information or questions regarding this RFP, please contact the Contracting Authority at Atlantic Region Acquisitions, located at 1713 Bedford Row, Halifax, NS B3J 1T3. Services are provided in English.

**Contact Information:**
Nicole Fesseha, Contract Specialist, PSPC/SPAC
Email: [nicole.fesseha@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:nicole.fesseha@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
